reviewText:
Benny Hinn affectionately mentions Miss Kuhlman, and there are subtle touches of her ministry flowing through his ministry.
You can feel the conviction of the faith in Jesus, and his power to heal coming through the testimony's of these people whom Miss Kuhlman is interviewing. People like Miss Kuhlman helped shape my Worldview, a world with no cancer, polio, TB, aids, and where God promises to heal all deceases and broken hearts.
